content: You need to contact the messaging company to reset your password.
creator: MattAuSupport

content: dear rpkemorrell, if you have forgot your password you can visit this website https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/protect-your-thunderbird-passwords-primary-password#w_reset-your-primary-password-if-you-have-forgotten-it
creator: logan.chan

content: are you talking about a thunderbird primary password see https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/protect-your-thunderbird-passwords-primary-password#w_reset-your-primary-password-if-you-have-forgotten-it, or the password for your mail account. If it is the later you need to contact your mail provider.
creator: MattAuSupport

content:
La procedura per usare account Outlook.com su Thunderbird è descritta qui -> https://support.mozilla.org/it/kb/autenticazione-oauth-microsoft-thunderbird-2023

Ci trovi anche le procedure da seguire per i problemi più comuni.
creator: @next

content: The password that Thunderbird has is likely wrong, as it apparently isn't working. You can see that at settings>privacy&security. Otherwise, to reset your password you need to contact your email provider.
creator: davidsk
